title: His Excellencies letter of the 30 of Ianuary, 1643 To the Earle of Forth, upon that letter sent to him from the Prince, Duke of Yorke, and divers lords and gentlemen at Oxford.
author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.
notes: A letter from the Earl of Essex to the Earl of Forth, enclosing a copy of the Solemn League and Covenant.
The year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
